name: job
description: Type of job: admin., blue-collar, entrepreneur, housemaid, management, retired, self-employed, services, student, technician, unemployed, unknown

name: marital
description: Marital status: divorced, married, single, unknown

name: education
description: Level of education: primary, secondary, tertiary, unknown

name: default
description: Has credit in default: no, yes, unknown

name: balance
description: Average yearly balance in Euro: numerical value

name: housing
description: Has housing loan: no, yes, unknown

name: loan
description: Has personal loan: no, yes, unknown

name: day
description: Day of the month: numerical value between 1 and 31

name: month
description: Month of the year: jan, feb, mar, apr, may, jun, jul, aug, sep, oct, nov, dec

name: duration
description: Last contact duration: numerical value in seconds

name: campaign
description: Number of contacts made: numerical value

name: pdays
description: Number of days passed since client was last contacted from a previous campaign: numerical value, -1 indicates client was not previously contacted

name: previous
description: Number of contacts performed before this campaign and for this client: numerical value

name: poutcome
description: Outcome of previous marketing campaign: unknown, other, failure, success
